text: Sooryachakram is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by K Krishnan, starring Saikumar and Jagathy Sreekumar in the lead roles. http://www.ibollytv.com/movies/77d81180/soorya-chakram-1992-malayalam-movie- watch.html ==Cast== *Jagathy Sreekumar * Sreelatha Namboothiri * Mahesh * Maniyanpilla Raju * Prathapachandran * Jagannadha Varma * Jagannadhan * Kollam Ajith * Nirmala * Saikumar * Santhakumari ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Sooryachakram
